import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import CheckoutSteps from "../components/CheckoutSteps"; export default function PlaceOrderScreen(props) { /*Import cart from REDUX STORE*/ const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart); /*Checking whether user had selected the payment method or not*/ if(!cart.paymentMethod) { props.history.push('/payment'); }; const placeOrderHandler = () => { }; const toPrice = (num) => Number(num.toFixed(2)); /* e.g., it takes 5.123 => converts to string "5.123" => and then to the number of two decimal places */ /*For Cart items and Price*/ cart.itemsPrice = toPrice(cart.cartItems.reduce((a, c) => a + c.qty * c.price, 0)) /*Shipping Price*/ cart.shippingPrice = cart.itemsPrice > 100 ? toPrice(0) : toPrice(40); /*For Tax Price*/ cart.taxPrice = toPrice(0.15 * cart.itemsPrice); /*Total amount calculation*/ cart.totalPrice = cart.itemsPrice + cart.shippingPrice + cart.taxPrice; const date = useState(currentDateTime => Date().toLocalString()); return(

  • Shipping

    Name: {cart.shippingAddress.fullName}
    Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {cart.shippingAddress.country}

  • Payment

    Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

  • Ordered Items

      { cart.cartItems.map((item) => (
    • {item.name}
      {item.qty} Pieces x {item.price} Rs/Unit = Rs. {item.qty * item.price}
      • ) )}

  • Order Summary

  • Items
    Rs. {cart.itemsPrice}
  • Shipping
    Rs. {cart.shippingPrice}
  • Tax
    Rs. {cart.taxPrice}
  • Total Amount
    Rs. {cart.totalPrice}
) }
